welcomeSlogan: Edit documents with your friends in real time!
slogan2: Co-Edit allows you to co-edit the same document with others online in real-time.
teamUp2: Differentiate every user with different colors.
update2: Supports mobile devices so you can update content anytime anywhere.
privacy2: Only you can grant or remove access to your documents.
pdf2: Co-Edit supports exporting your documents as PDF files
name: name
toLogin: Already have an account? Login now!
toSignup: Don't have an account? Sign Up now!
title: title:
sure: Are you sure you want to delete this document?
type: Type the document name to delete the document
noLogin: Sorry! you have to login first.
unAuth: Sorry! You are not authorized to access this document.
doc_403: Sorry! You are not authorized to access this document.
docDelete: Sorry, this document just been deleted.
